newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Heineken sees French buys break-even in three yrs.
newsitem.headline: Heineken sees French buys break-even in three yrs.

text.p: Dutch brewer Heineken NV said on Friday its recent acquisitions in France, including the Fischer group, would contribute to net profits in around three years.
"It's difficult to give a concrete answer but we expect the acquisitions to contribute to net profit in around three years," chairman Karel Vuursteen told a news conference.
He said it would take time to integrate the distribution systems and brand portfolios.
"But we're very confident we can pull it off at the end of the day," he said. --Amsterdam newsroom +31 20 504 5000
